TableSettings.uniqueName:
IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-safe%2C+Trunkselect b.booking_reference from ca_booked_person b where b.checked_out_date_time is null and b.rejected_date_time is null and b.cancellation_date_time is null and b.checked_in_date_time is not null and access_badge_number = :badge_number
union all( select p.booking_reference from ca_badge b, ca_person_interface p where b.person_code = p.person_code and b.person_type = p.person_type and b.person_type = 'V' and b.status_ind = 'V' and b.badge_number = :badge_number )
